title: geth 1.4.7 crashes on synchronisation
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.4.7`
OS & Version: Windows 10
#### Expected behaviour

Successfull synchronisation
#### Actual behaviour

Synchronization process crashes and causes a corrupt db. Next time you open Geth the sync process has to start from 0 again.                                                                                                  
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Start geth and wait for it to start syncing. After a while it crashes because of 100% disk IO. 
`geth --fast console`
#### Backtrace
